text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump People are dying. We are at the beginning of a global crisis that Trump declared a hoax. Investigation is needed to make sure this insanity is not repeated! Get your facts straight Green! #coronavirus #TrumpPandemic
